reference.title: MME support for CIoT for inbound roamers (Feature f11738-01): feature summary
reference.shortdesc: This feature supports CIoT for inbound roamers. It supports connection to IWK-SCEF, NB-IoT, and LTE-M operation. This feature also controls the access to NB-IoT RAT for inbound roamers.

table.title: MME support for CIoT for inbound roamers: feature summary

li.p: 3GPP TS 23.682, Architectural enhancements to facilitate communications with packet data networks and applications.
3GPP TS 29.128, Mobility Management Entity (MME) and Serving GPRS Support Node (SGSN) interfaces for interworking with packet data networks and applications.
3GPP TS 29.272, MME and SGSN related interfaces based on Diameter Protocol.

li.ph: MME support for non-IP with S1-U transferred (Feature f11723-01)
Switching data transport between control plane and user plane (Feature f11708-01)
Control plane CIoT optimization for non-IP data delivery (NIDD) via Service Capability Exposure Function (SCEF) (Feature f11701-02)
Control plane CIoT EPS optimizations for both non-IP data and IP through SGi (Feature f11701-03)
MME support for CIoT monitoring procedures (Feature f11702-01)
User plane CIoT EPS optimizations - bearer activation without SR (Feature f11701-04)
MME support for MONTE communications failure event (Feature f11733-05)
PDN connectivity status event reporting (MONTE): feature summary (Feature f11733-04)
CMM support for Rel 16 MONTE and CIoT CRs (Feature f11733-11)

entry.p: Command scefToGrp, parameters cirDestHostFqdnName, cirDestRealmFqdnName and iwkScef.
